alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; McHenry; Pierce; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN BOTTINEAU, NORTHWESTERN PIERCE, NORTHEASTERN MCHENRY AND WESTERN ROLETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM CDT... At 1144 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Westhope to 10 miles southwest of Bottineau to 7 miles west of Willow City. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Willow City around 1200 AM CDT. Bottineau around 1210 AM CDT. Dunseith and Lake Metigoshe State Park around 1240 AM CDT. International Peace Garden around 1245 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Omemee, Gardena, Carbury, Overly and Roth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
